body.p:
UNTIED WE STAND, DIVIDED WE FALL.
KENTUCKY.
Head-Quarters Kentucky State Guard,
INSPECTOR GENERAL'S OFFICE
Frankfort, Ky., Jan 12th 1864
To His Excellency
Thos E Bramlette
Gov of Ky
The undersigned begs leave to report to your Excellency that the arrests made by the State Police under his control for the month ending Jan 12th 1864 were as follows

row.cell: Total amt of wages paid to Jan 12th 1864

body.p: A lack of horses for scouting purposes is the only Excuse I can offer for the small number of Deserters arrested.
This Statement is respectfully submitted for your Excellencys Consideration

J K Edwards
chf Ky Police
